urm Goroy was a convicted criminal from the city of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
In the , Durm Goroy was accused of an assassination attempt on Lord Enver Gortash during The Absolute Crisis. Whether this was truth or a political setup, Durm was arrested, tried, and condemned to public execution. As the Absolutist army marched on Baldurs Gate and unbeknownst to all, Lord Gortash being one of the Absolutes leaders, Durm, alongside a fellow prisoner named Vince Torell, was to be transferred from the Stonyeyes Precinct of the Flaming Fist to the Basilisk Gate prison on the orders from Manip Farthingale. Basilisk Gate had a handy plaza with a hanging stage set up for public executions at the time.
